question: Who was appointed the chairperson of Shilpi Sansad, an organization that offers financial security to retired and experienced artistes of Bengali film industry?
explanation: Actor Rituparna Sengupta was appointed the chairperson of Shilpi Sansad. Rituparna Sengupta replaces Supriya Devi. Supriya Devi passed away recently. Shilpi Sansad was set up by Uttam Kumar in 1968. It offers financial security to retired and experienced artistes of Bengali film industry. It provides financial assistance to artistes in times of emergency and for medical treatments.
